name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
desc: Grilled chicken, crisp romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, and tangy Caesar dressing wrapped in a warm tortilla, creating a delicious and satisfying meal.

name: Garlic Butter Shrimp
desc: Succulent shrimp saut√©ed in a flavorful garlic butter sauce, served with rice or pasta and a side of steamed vegetables.

name: Loaded Potato Skins
desc: Crispy potato skins filled with melted cheese, crispy bacon bits, and topped with sour cream and chives, a perfect appetizer or snack.

name: Ribeye Steak
desc: A premium cut of beef known for its tenderness and rich flavor, seasoned and grilled to your desired level of doneness, served with a choice of side dishes.

name: Steakhouse Burger
desc: A mouthwatering burger made with a juicy beef patty, topped with melted cheese, crispy bacon, caramelized onions, lettuce, tomato, and served on a toasted bun.

name: California Roll
desc: A popular sushi roll made with crab meat, avocado, cucumber, and sesame seeds, wrapped in sushi rice and seaweed.

name: Teriyaki Chicken
desc: Grilled chicken glazed with a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce, served with steamed rice and a side of vegetables.

name: Miso Soup
desc: A traditional Japanese soup made with fermented soybean paste (miso), tofu, seaweed, and scallions, providing a comforting and savory flavor.

name: Tempura Shrimp
desc: Crispy and golden-brown battered shrimp served with a tangy dipping sauce, perfect as an appetizer or main dish.

name: Sushi Platter
desc: An assortment of fresh and expertly crafted sushi rolls, nigiri, and sashimi, showcasing a variety of flavors and textures.

name: Beef Burger
desc: A juicy beef patty grilled to perfection, topped with cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, and served on a toasted bun.

name: Margherita Pizza
desc: A traditional Italian pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil.

name: Caesar Salad
desc: A refreshing salad made with crisp romaine lettuce, homemade Caesar dressing, crunchy croutons, and shaved Parmesan cheese.

name: Chicken Alfredo
desc: Tender grilled chicken breast smothered in a creamy Alfredo sauce made with butter, cream, and Parmesan cheese, served over fettuccine pasta.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
desc: A classic Italian dish featuring al dente spaghetti served with a rich and flavorful Bolognese sauce made with ground meat, tomatoes, and aromatic herbs.
